Note:

  1. There's no libs in any Sample Code
  2. After Integration, please check if it has VponLog:didImpression in Log to make sure the information of impression will send back to our server
  3. Apple recently brought a new security feature, App Transport Security (ATS), to iOS9. If you are using the latest Xcode 7 to build or migrate to an iOS9 project, please refer to this link for some modification.
